meanings.definition: The quality or state of being intangible.
meanings.sent1: The intangiblenesses of the dream made it hard to grasp.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the intangiblenesses of friendship more than material possessions.
meanings.sent3: The intangiblenesses of the situation left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: His words carried the intangiblenesses of hope and inspiration.
meanings.sent5: The intangiblenesses of love filled the room with warmth and joy.

meanings.definition: The intangible aspects or qualities of something.
meanings.sent1: Exploring the intangiblenesses of nature brought a sense of wonder.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the intangiblenesses of emotions in her painting.
meanings.sent3: The intangiblenesses of the music made it impossible not to dance.
meanings.sent4: His speech was filled with the intangiblenesses of wisdom and experience.
meanings.sent5: The intangiblenesses of memories lingered in the air, evoking nostalgia.
